R0056.title: Fake Reviews
R0056.definition: A seller purchases fake positive reviews to boost product reputation or search ranking weight.
R0056.description: Sellers collude with buyers through low-price orders, empty package shipments, or virtual deliveries to generate fake transactions and bulk positive reviews, boosting store credibility or product rankings.
R0056.influence: Undermines platform fairness and distorts ranking algorithms.

references.title: Fake Reviews / Review Brushing - Baidu Baike
